heading: HB08262
0: AN ACT DECLARING THE UPPER AGNO RIVER BASIN PROTECTED LANDSCAPE IN THE MUNICIPALITIES OF BOKOD AND KABAYAN; AND SOME PORTIONS OF THE MUNICIPALITIES OF ATOK, BUGUIAS, ITOGON, LA TRINIDAD, AND TUBLAY, ALL IN THE PROVINCE OF BENGUET; PORTIONS OF BAUKO, MT. PROVINCE; PORTIONS OF TINOC, IFUGAO AND KAYAPA, NUEVA VIZCAYA AS A PROTECTED AREA UNDER THE CATEGORY OF PROTECTED LANDSCAPES, PROVIDING FOR ITS MANAGEMENT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2019-05-20, transmitted to the Senate on 2019-05-21 and received by the Senate on 2019-05-21 Substituted by HB09074
